short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use CryptoTracker as your Chrome dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "CryptoTracker" transforms your new tab into a stunning display of real-time cryptocurrency market data. With a sleek interface, you can instantly appreciate the landscape of your crypto investments as soon as you open a new tab. Witness the highs and revel in the prosperity of your digital assets. This extension is perfect for the bullish trader who loves to keep a close eye on the ever-fluctuating world of cryptocurrency. However, bear market hodlers be warned: the vivid display of market performance might not be for the faint of heart.
